website_summaries.verdict: Despite a novel construction and scuff-proof exterior, the LG G Flex's doesn't flex enough muscle against the Samsung Galaxy Round or the Note 3.
pros: The LG G Flex's contoured display renders media watching more immersive, it features a scratch-resistant coating, and its sizable battery provides an adequate amount of juice
cons: The G Flex's massive size can be unwieldy, its camera quality is mediocre, and its 720p display can't outpace its competitors

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY THIS IS A PEICE OF S***!
customer_reviews.text: PHONE WAS GARBAGE DID NOT WORK AFTER A MONTH...SMH DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Toya

customer_reviews.title: 3G dont work for me. The D955 is the version I needed
customer_reviews.text: Phone is great please consider that this is an HONG KONG and ASIA version. I cannot make INTERNET work properly because of this... It suck, but well I still give it 5 stars because is not his fault that I dint check the specs. Update: I find another carrier that supports this frequency and it works great. 5,1mbps download speed according to speedtest
customer_reviews.author: Werner

customer_reviews.title: Disorted Picture
customer_reviews.text: The curved Shape was supposed to be for better picture, but when turn the. phone to be horizontal the picture gets distorted. Its an absolute turn off
customer_reviews.author: salmaan khalid ahsan

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever
customer_reviews.text: Really like my LG Flex. It is the right size to work on the internet of things. Everyone of my friends likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Arnulfo J. Guerra

customer_reviews.title: I TRIED 3 TIMES TO ASK FOR A REPLACMENT NOT ...
customer_reviews.text: I TRIED 3 TIMES TO ASK FOR A REPLACMENT NOT ONE TIME DID I GET A REPLY THE PHONE DOES NOT WORK ANYMORE I AM MAD I WANT A REPLACMENT!
customer_reviews.author: sabrina nichole drager

customer_reviews.title: LG G Flex is not a Note
customer_reviews.text: Display good, love curve design, battery life great, chip set, apps run smooth. Can not expand memory so you are limit to videos and movies you can store. LG get with this century add a slot for storage. With case phone looks huge, with out case phone slide in front pocket. Phone camera suck I am surprise LG let a phone of this caliber get outside there door with that camera. Get the Note you will be much happier.
customer_reviews.author: Leonjr

customer_reviews.title: Looks like IT IS A USED PHONE or a display phone ...
customer_reviews.text: It took a century to received this item, but it's reasonable since it was shipped from Hong Kong. Looks like IT IS A USED PHONE or a display phone i guess, because the original box is not sealed and the condition of the phone is not what i imagine a new phone have to be. come with a case and screen protector (if it is a screen protector?) on it.
customer_reviews.author: Estella Toh

customer_reviews.title: Very bad, the manual is not in English and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very bad, the manual is not in English and the person I got the phone for has not been able to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Not international version.
customer_reviews.text: This was not the international version. It has SK Telecom (South Korea Telecom) all over it. The keyboard is default to Korean and you have to switch to english. The boot loader is also in Korean and I had to use a camera translate app.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: wodrfuul
customer_reviews.text: Yeah well, at least to me. I have read and watched so many videos about how the screen quality is not as sharp as others (even from LG) but to me, it is perfect. The light matte to the screen is nice, it feels more sophisticated and expensive. While everyone has the new Ferrari, you have the new Rolls.
customer_reviews.author: caponata giuseppe

customer_reviews.title: It was not what I was expecting for
customer_reviews.text: The equipment was in mint condition as new, I choose to return the product due to te product was not able to use my country signal band for the LTE connection.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto

customer_reviews.title: Best Phone that I have owned yet
customer_reviews.text: Best Phone that I have owned yet. Every touch screen device that I have owned cracked within a couple months, while this phone survived being smashed into the ground when I tripped. I love my phone, and it definitely draws lots of attention everywhere I go due to it standing out of the crowd.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic android device
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone for over a year now and it has been one of the best I've ever owned. I have no plans to get a new device anytime soon. Very pleased customer here.
customer_reviews.author: Nick T

customer_reviews.title: terrible customer support service in US!
customer_reviews.text: Sent my like new LG G Flex for fixing because the phone stopped working without any reason! Today I called them and they said that the phone is not repairable because the main-board smashed! Which is completely fake. The phone hasn't even one scratch nether any kind of damage, so how come the motherboard get damaged. Terrible company terrible customer support.
customer_reviews.author: janjwan

customer_reviews.title: No memory card slot = deal breaker
customer_reviews.text: None of the features matter if we can't use the phone, 20gb free hard drive space wont hold much music & 2160p video
customer_reviews.author: Ben

product_meta.title: LG G Flex LG-F340 Real Round Curved Display Smart Phone Factory Unlocked 6" Screen
product_meta.description: Rear-facing camera13MP autofocus with LED flash Zoom8x digital Live video capture and playback. Full HD 1080p video capture with 720p video playback Live zoom. Zoom in on pre-recorded video Front-facing camera2.1MP with full HD 1080p video capture Dual recording. Use both cameras to include the photographer in an inset window in the video. Dual camera. Use both cameras to include the photographer in a picture-in-picture photo Display size (inches)6.0 Resolution (pixels)1280x720 HD OLED Aspect ratio16:9 Colors16 million 4G-LTEBand 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 7 and 17 4GHSPA+ with enhanced backhaul 3G - UMTS850/1900/2100MHz GSM/GPRS/EDGE850/900/1800/1900MHz Wi-Fi connectivity802.11 a/b/g/n 5GHz Wi-Fi-capable Near Field Communication (NFC)Open, Secure, ISIS Bluetooth technologyv4.0 LE Mobile Hotspot - Up to 8 devices Dual Window - Display two windows on the screen at once Slide Aside - Jump between three apps with ease QSlide 2.0Multitask with up to three different screens simultaneously on one display, adjust the relative sizes of each window, or copy and paste from one window to the other Quick Memo - Take notes on any screen, save, and share via text, email, and social networks instantly Calendar Alarm clock Call waiting Caller ID Address book Conference calling - Up to 5 callers Call forwarding Multitasking - Use voice and data simultaneously Internal memory storage - Up to 32GB RAM2GB
